Quicklinks

A bookish career

Literary festival director and writer Claire Mabey introduced LitCrawl to Wellington, and recently won an award giving her time to write.

Dual degree partnership

Te Herenga Waka and OP Jindal Global University in Sonepat have established a dual degree partnership.

Public lectures

  • Occupying 'in-hospitable' spaces

    Inaugural lectures

    23 Aug 2022 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm

    Register

    Professor Karen McBride-Henry discusses her research into the experiences of parents of children repeatedly hospitalised with acute respiratory infections.

  • Artificial Intelligence: state of the art, applications, and impact

    Inaugural lectures

    9 Aug 2022 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm

    Register

    Join Professor Bing Xue as she discusses her cutting-edge AI research and its implications for solving real-world problems.

  • Framing people at work

    Inaugural lectures

    26 Jul 2022 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm

    Watch video

    Professor Jane Bryson discusses how taking different perspectives on people at work can transform the field of human resource management.
